section-1: Nhật ký này giúp bạn nâng cao khả năng viết lách bằng tiếng anh
section-2: Write about your day to take your Japanese skills to the next level.
section-3: Set reminders so you never forget to write an entry again.
section-4: Pay attention to your improvements and celebrate your successes.
